mapper.update: update eb_user_bill set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_id = #{linkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pm = #{pm,jdbcType=BIT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, link_id, pm, title, category, type, number, balance, mark, add_time, status, ctime from eb_user_bill where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
